sentences.english: I highly suspect cervical spondylopathy，but we need you to have an X-ray to make it clear.
sentences.chinese: 我高度怀疑颈椎病，但你要拍个颈椎片才清楚。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the clinical effects of ultrasound treatment in vertebral artery type of cerviˉcal spondylopathy.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察超声治疗椎动脉型颈椎病的临床疗效。

sentences.english: Cervical spondylosis is a very common condition that usually occurs in the second half of life.
sentences.chinese: 颈椎病是非常普遍的情况下通常发生在下半年的生活。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate clinical effects of Chiropractic therapy on Cervical spondylopathy.
sentences.chinese: 目地观察美式正脊治疗椎动脉型颈椎病的疗效。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo study the relationship betweenneck pain caused by cervical spondylosis and insomnia.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨颈椎病颈痛与失眠之间的关系。

sentences.english: Objective The curative effects of vertebroarterial cervical spondylosis treated by hydro acupuncture were observed.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察水针治疗椎动脉型颈椎病的疗效。

sentences.english: Objective To study the mechanism of cervical spondylosis treatment of trembling manipulation at Dazhui (DU14) acupoint.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究大椎穴运用振法治疗颈椎病的治疗机制。

sentences.english: It is an important theory of professor Shi Qi to treat cervical spondylosis from arthralgia -syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 从痹论治颈椎病是施杞教授重要学术思想。

sentences.english: Objective To summarize some experience in treating serious spinal cervical spondylosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的总结严重脊髓型颈椎病的手术治疗经验。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the effects of conservation treatment cervical spondylosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨颈椎病的保守治疗效果。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the clinical effects of massage treatment of cervical spondylotic arteriopathy(CSA).
sentences.chinese: 目的观察手法推拿治疗椎动脉型颈椎病的临床疗效。

sentences.english: Conclusion The non-operative treatment to sympathetic cervical spondylosis is safe, rational and efficient.
sentences.chinese: 结论非手术治疗交感型颈椎病是安全，合理和有效的。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate MRI and MRA in the diagnosing of vertebral arterial insufficiency due to cervical spondylosis .
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨椎动脉型颈椎病的MRI诊断价值及其限度。

sentences.english: Conclusion Liu's massage technique is effective on cervical vertebra disease of teenagers.
sentences.chinese: 结论刘氏按摩手法治疗青少年颈椎病疗效明显。

sentences.english: CSM group consisted of 20 CSM patients.
Objectve To investigate the mechanism of Arctium lappa soup on the treatment of cervical spondylosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探析牛蒡子汤治疗颈椎病的作用机理。

pinyin: yao1 zhui1 jian1 pan2 tu1 chu1
yao1 zhui1 jian1 pan2 tu1 chu1 zheng4

definition: cervical vertebra/the seven cervical vertebrae in the neck of humans and most mammals
to have a stiff neck after sleeping/(of the head) to touch the pillow

pinyin: feng1 shi1 xing4 guan1 jie2 yan2
qiang2 zhi2 xing4 ji3 zhu4 yan2
